Class SwingChartDisplayProvider

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.bridge.SwingChartDisplayProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChartDisplayProvider
public class SwingChartDisplayProvider extends Object implements ChartDisplayProvider
Swing implementation of ChartDisplayProvider.

This provider is automatically discovered via ServiceLoader when arbercharts-swing-bridge is on the classpath.

Features

  • Creates a properly configured JFrame with ArberChartPanel
  • Thread-safe display using SwingUtilities.invokeLater
  • FlatLaf dark theme by default
  • Sensible default window size (800x600)

ServiceLoader Registration

Registered in: META-INF/services/com.arbergashi.charts.ChartDisplayProvider

Since:
2.0.0

  • Method Details

    • showChart

      public void showChart(SimpleChart chart, String title, ChartModel model, ChartRenderer renderer)
      Displays the chart in a platform-specific window.

      Creates a JFrame with an ArberChartPanel and displays the chart. The frame is centered on screen with a default size of 800x600.

      Specified by:
      showChart in interface ChartDisplayProvider
      Parameters:
      chart - the SimpleChart instance (for callbacks)
      title - the window title (may be null)
      model - the chart data model
      renderer - the chart renderer
